description:
Clayton is a Pokémon trainer that challenged Ash and his Buizel to a battle near the shores of a river while on route to Asatsuki Town. Clayton has been using the area as his field to eagerly train against Pokémon with his Mr. Mime for many years. Clayton`s Mr. Mime defeated Buizel in the first battle, but Buizel was able to defeat it in the rematch.
Clayton and Mr. Mime both enjoyed Brock`s meal which was prepared after the first battle with Ash and they were both grateful that he prepared it for them. Clayton also helped Ash`s Buizel train so that it could learn Ice Punch.
name: Kijuurou
